name: The Block Pro
title: Gaming Trends In 2024
text:
Synopsis
In 2024, blockchain gaming and Layer 1 (L1) blockchains experienced mixed performance, with Ronin emerging as a standout blockchain and consumer applications driving growth, while NFTs and GameFi continued to face market challenges.

Key Insights
- Ronin blockchain is currently the 4th most used blockchain, ranking behind Ethereum, Bitcoin, and Solana
- Layer 1 blockchains that prioritized scalability, low fees, and user experience captured significant market share in 2024
- NFTs and GameFi sectors continued to experience declines in sales volume, transaction counts, and average floor prices
- Layer 2 (L2) blockchain landscape saw considerable growth in the first half of 2024, with multiple mainnet launches and token airdrops
- The L2 space experienced diminished interest in the latter half of 2024
